com.interpss.core.algo.dclf.solver

Class BaseDclfSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.core.algo.impl.solver.BMatrixSolver
      • com.interpss.core.algo.dclf.solver.BaseDclfSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDclfSolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DblAryCacheDclfSolver, DclfSolver, HashMapCacheDclfSolver

    public abstract class BaseDclfSolver
extends BMatrixSolver
implements IDclfSolver
    Base Solver for dclf and sensitivity analysis injBus |--- monitoring branch ---| withdrawBus - Sensitivity is regarding to an injection bus or an injection bus + a withdraw bus - Branch shifting factor for a monitoring branch is the ratio of the monitoring branch current with regarding the the injection current + withdraw current
